Articles.Content: I think it would be nice to be able to transfer crew from one part of a vehicle to another part of a vehicle, if the two parts are directly connected together via a medium or large clampotron, without EVA.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but I'm pretty sure Max stated that this feature will arrive in 0.25.

I think it would be nice to be able to transfer crew from one part of a vehicle to another part of a vehicle, if the two parts are directly connected together via a medium or large clampotron, without EVA.

or you can use

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82101-0-24-2-Kerbal-Crew-Transfer-v0-5-released-0-24-support-and-Crew-Swapping
Dude, this is coming already, just be patient
